TextBlock.Text: OKALIS: I believe I may have a plan to rescue Ditylum, but I will need to conduct more research at the <color=orange>Enzyme Lab</color>. Please make your way over there ASAP. I truly believe this idea is promising.
SENNETTI: I seem to have forgotten where the <color=orange>Enzyme Lab</color> is, would you mind reminding me?
OKALIS: The lab resides in one of the fish near the <color=orange>Anglerfish Observation Platform</color>. It is fairly large, so it should be plainly visible.
NESIA: An important note; remember to pet the fishâ€™s eye before attempting to enter the lab, otherwise, the fish will likely digest you!
